thread.title: ‘Queen of Benefits’ Mum-of-12 who rakes in £40k expecting child number 13
thread.title_full: ‘Queen of Benefits’ Mum-of-12 who rakes in £40k expecting child number 13

title: ‘Queen of Benefits’ Mum-of-12 who rakes in £40k expecting child number 13
text:
Published 18th February 2017 
Cheryl Prudham – who already gets £40,000-a-year in taxpayers’ cash – is expecting for the 13th time. 
The baby machine – dubbed “Britain’s most shameless mum”– has another bundle of joy…or cash…on the way after finding herself a new man. 
ITV BLOOMING: Cheryl Prudham with former husband Robert and some of their children 
Sugar mum Cheryl, 34, has hooked up with jobless Lee Ball – who is five years her junior. 
Their new little un will be Cheryl’s 13th child by four different men. Benefits mum: Cheryl Prudham Friday, 18th December 2015 Unemployed Couple Robert and Cheryl Prudham receive around £38,000 a year in benefits for their 12 children. The couple have spent thousands on holidays and designer clothes, here they are with trolley loads of Xmas presents. 1 / 15 SWNS.com Cheryl Prudham and her family at home in Kent, the family receive £38000 a year in benefits “I can have as many children as I want” Cheryl Prudham 
Cheryl, who lives in Warrington, sparked public outrage after appearing on Channel 5 show Benefits: Britain’s Most Shameless Mum last year. 
She boasted about splashing your cash – meant for bringing up her ballooning brood – on expensive holidays and designer gear. 
SWNS FAMILY SIZE: Cheryl and Robert have since gone their separate ways Related Articles
